name: Capital One Consulting
goal: We help companies in finding financial resources and tax breaks to achieve their own projects. We address companies towards strategic and organisational decisions for the growth. We simplify the path to obtain financial funds thanks to our expertise about procedures and laws. We define a focused and personalised consultancy by providing specific solutions. We address companies towards strategic and organisational decisions for the growth.
interests: Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Energy, Environment, External Relations, International co-operation and development, Research and innovation, Sport, Transport
euInitiatives: We want to deepen and enhance the quality of our job at this level. We are targeting the area of the European Projects for SME, bringing our competency and expertise to a European level.
